content: happy international crochet day september 12 i wrote this pattern at 2 a m on september 12 2008 because i couldn t sleep and i wanted to celebrate the day by writing my very first pattern to share on ravelry this is a crocheted bracelet or cuff in eyelets with a picot edge that you can thread a ribbon through if you want you can make a series of chains as a tie to put in the eyelets the purpose of the bracelet is to remind you to tell people how wonderful crochet is and also hopefully people will see you wearing it and ask you about it thereby creating windows of opportunity to spread crochet love the eyelet spaces remind me of windows windows of opportunity you may also make these to sell at craft fairs
